column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from February 10 to March 17, 2003.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (71 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: May 16, 2003
